name: Power Coloring
overview:
It's time to color!

Power Coloring features over 70 scenes to color, draw, write, and create on. Or you can let your imagination go wild on a blank canvas. Yes, dinosaurs are included.

There are many tools at your disposal, a drawing pencil, eraser tool, area fill bucket, spray can, point to point line draw, letter & number stamps, and multiple color palettes to choose from. Includes Power Pad support so your kids can color while jumping!
